import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import StepIndicator from "../../StepIndicator/Steps"; import ContactPage from "../ContactUs/ContactPage"; // import Video from "./video/Video"; // Uncomment if you need this component function Index() { const [error, setError] = useState(""); const [jobsData, SetJobs] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const api = "http://localhost:2000/api/jobs/"; fetch(api) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { const jobsData = data.Jobs; SetJobs(jobsData); }) .catch((e) => { console.error(e.message); }); }, []); console.log(jobsData) return ( <>

Find our products and services

Branding news

Create an account
Sign in

Find Your Dream Job

Latest Job Listings

{jobsData && jobsData.length > 0 ? ( jobsData.map((item, index) => item ? (

{item.JOB_TITLE}

Company: {item.COMPANY}

Location: {item.LOCATION}

Salary: {item.SALARY}

Description: {item.DESCRIPTION}

Apply Now
) : null ) ) : (

There is no jobs available

{/*
)}
{/* */} ); } export default Index;
